content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 4, "index": 36}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft warped_hyphae, I need to place 4 warped_stem in a 2x2 square. I will start by moving the warped_stem from slot 36 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 45}]
thought: I will now move the warped_stem from slot 36 to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 45}]
thought: Next, I will move the warped_stem from slot 36 to slot 4, which is below slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 45}]
thought: Finally, I will move the warped_stem from slot 36 to slot 5, which is to the right of slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_hyphae
inventory=[{"type": "warped_hyphae", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "gilded_blackstone", "quantity": 54, "index": 12}, {"type": "light_blue_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 20}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 37, "index": 22}, {"type": "music_disc_pigstep", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "white_concrete_powder", "quantity": 52, "index": 29}, {"type": "chicken", "quantity": 42, "index": 32}, {"type": "ancient_debris", "quantity": 41, "index": 37}, {"type": "gray_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 45}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the warped_hyphae, I will move it from slot 0 to slot 11, which is an empty slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
